div.p: The geographic range of white-browed sparrow weavers, Plocepasser mahali, (shaded areas) and the mean circulating testosterone concentration of males in three distinct populations measured during the breeding season (October-March): Zambia (mean calculated from figures in Wingfield et al., 1991; n = 81 samples), Zimbabwe (mean calculated from figures in Voigt and Leitner, 2013; n = 47 samples), and South Africa (mean from data in this study; n = 133 samples).
